name: Mow!
description:
A grass mowing game "Mow!"

Game Features:

● EASY TO PLAY
Playable with one-hand!
Mow the grass and reach the goal by just swiping the screen!

● A SENSE OF MOWING
Feel the joy of mowing with the vibrations every time you mow the grass or trees.

● EASY STAGES
No need to be a rocket scientist to clear the stages!
Mow as you please!

● PLAY AT YOUR FREE TIME
All stages can be cleared in less than a minute!

● FREE TO PLAY
Completely free!
More stages to come!
